KeyExpression.SQL: (case when year_of_arrival_to_chile BETWEEN 1950 AND 1954 then '1950-1954' when year_of_arrival_to_chile BETWEEN 1955 AND 1959 then '1955-1959' when year_of_arrival_to_chile BETWEEN 1960 AND 1964 then '1960-1964' when year_of_arrival_to_chile BETWEEN 1965 AND 1969 then '1965-1969' when year_of_arrival_to_chile BETWEEN 1970 AND 1974 then '1970-1974' when year_of_arrival_to_chile BETWEEN 1975 AND 1979 then '1975-1979' when year_of_arrival_to_chile BETWEEN 1980 AND 1984 then '1980-1984' when year_of_arrival_to_chile BETWEEN 1985 AND 1989 then '1985-1990' when year_of_arrival_to_chile BETWEEN 1990 AND 1994 then '1990-1994' when year_of_arrival_to_chile BETWEEN 1995 AND 1999 then '1995-1999' when year_of_arrival_to_chile BETWEEN 2000 AND 2004 then '2000-2004' when year_of_arrival_to_chile BETWEEN 2005 AND 2009 then '2005-2009' when year_of_arrival_to_chile BETWEEN 2010 AND 2014 then '2010-2014' when year_of_arrival_to_chile BETWEEN 2015 AND 2017 then '2015-2017' when year_of_arrival_to_chile = 9998 then '9998' when year_of_arrival_to_chile = 9999 then '9999' end)
